document.full_text: u.s. health authorities will take over supervision of three johnson & johnson manufacturing plants after the healthcare giant failed to stem quality lapses that sparked a flood of recalls for consumer medicines like its tylenol painkiller.
document.title: fda to oversee j&j plants after flood of recalls
lines_and_colors: u.s. health authorities will take over supervision of three johnson & johnson manufacturing plants after the healthcare giant failed to stem quality lapses that sparked a flood of recalls for consumer medicines like its tylenol painkiller.
